text: Reza and Fara are extremely hospitable bakers who put quality in every bread. I love their Iranian-style flatbread topped with sesame seeds.

Located in strip mall at Yonge & Weldrick. Storefront only has 2 fridges with various cheeses, (unmarked) prepared foods and a small counter for the sangak bread. I only tried the sangak: crisp on the edges and chewy near the middle. $3.75 for 1 large piece. Lots of other locals also there to pick up bread too.

Uncle Reza has great selection of middle eastern traditional bread selections. Always fresh and delightful. Always welcoming and great customer service. Prices are very affordable and food is always fresh.
